Title: TotalEnergies, NNPC take FID on gas project to feed NLNG
Description: TotalEnergies and the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation have made the final investment decision to develop the Ubeta gas field, which will provide additional feed gas for the 22.1 mtpa NLNG plant in Bonny Island, Nigeria.
Author: JS

Title: Genting awards EPC contract to Wison for FLNG project in Indonesia
Description: Malaysia’s holding company Genting Berhad, via its indirect subsidiaries, awarded an USD962.8 million engineering, procurement and construction contract to China’s floating LNG unit builder Wison New Energies for a planned 1.2 mtpa floating LNG facility offshore Teluk Bintuni, West Papua, Indonesia.
Author: JS

Title: LNG ship diverts from Argentina amid talk of a cancelled cargo for Escobar
Description: A laden LNG ship that was scheduled to call at the 6.1 mtpa Escobar LNG receiving terminal in Argentina yesterday has made an about-turn, suggesting either a deferred delivery or a cancellation of the cargo on board. The vessel diversion comes amid talk of Argentina’s state-owned firm Energia Argentina, or Enarsa, cancelling a cargo it purchased for the current winter season.
Author: CK
